  • Gallery

Gallery¶

The static pages of your HubBoxx website has the ability to display an image and video gallery that can be managed from the Gallery section of the admin dashboard.

Gallery management requires you to be looged in as an admin.

The Gallery section can be accessed by pointing your web browser to http://yourdomain.com/admin/gallery where yourdomain.com is your actual domain name or click on Management > Gallery on the admin dashboard.

When editing or creating a gallery item, you would find a tags input field, the tags you enter there will be used to sort and group gallery items on your static pages where the Gallery has been included.
